creator: matty.rnld@gmail.com
text:
Hi All,

httpd processes has 100% cpu utilization in user space, when we
download Large files, download and other request are redirected via
weblogic apache plugin from apache server to the application server.

download big files from directly from the apache web server or
downloading  big files directly from the application server (e.g
apache server redirects the request directly to the application server
via external redirect) there is no issue. Issue is happening when the
download is streaming from the webserver to application server via
weblogic plugin ( did not test other streaming application) in test we
download 1.14 GB files. using "orbit" download client we do not see
the problem, but Orbit creates 8 concurrent request and splits the download in small pieces. Modzilla, created just a single request and immediately the http thread utilization goes to 100%.

Can any one please help?

Regards,

Matty

creator: covener@gmail.com
text: if downloading from Apache HTTP Server directly works, and you only have a problem when you use a vendors module, you need to report the symptom to the vendor.
